title: Destiny 2 players will shortly be banned from equipping crafted weapons
description: Bungie outlines plans to get on top of an in-game exploit that's letting players give Exotic perks to Legendary weapons.

title: Amnesia: The Bunker will take away your only happy place this Halloween
description: Amnesia: The Bunker's new Shell Shocked mode will randomize items, lockers, and rats, and take away the safety of the Admin Office.

title: Starfield mod that removes pronoun options has been banned by NexusMods
description: One of the biggest PC mod repositories in the world has removed a Starfield mod that lets players remove pronoun options from their game.

title: PS5 launches a new range of metallic covers and DualSense controllers
description: This new range of metallic covers and controllers for PS5 go on sale next month and include blue, red, and silver variants.

title: Payday 3 has dropped the anti-piracy system Denuvo
description: The third instalment of the fan-favorite shooter has ditched plans to use the Denuvo DRM system.

title: The Google Pixel 9 might not get much of a chipset upgrade
description: It looks as though Google will again partner with Samsung for the Tensor G4 chip appearing next year.

title: Apple reveals more details about the new iPhone 15 USB-C port
description: We've got a few more bits of information about how the USB-C port will work on the iPhone 15.

title: Microsoft Surface Go 4: everything we know so far about the rumored 2-in-1
description: With the special Surface event just around the corner, signs point to the Microsoft Surface Go 4 making an appearance. Will the line recover from the badly-received Surface Go 3?

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, September 17 (game #601)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: ​​GPU prices could spike again as rumors indicate AMD wants to prioritize AI – what could that mean for gamers?
description: AMD may nix the Radeon RX 8800 and 8900 so it can join Nvidia in fuelling the AI rush.
